channel.title: Reaper Mission Question
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Reaper Mission Question" - Rank affect mission select?

item.title: Re: Reaper Mission Question
item.content:encoded:
ok, I'm glad I'm not crazy then :)
I couldn't find this stated anywhere in the wiki, so I'm gonna add it to the info tab in the missions page.

item.title: Re: Reaper Mission Question
item.content:encoded: It is correct as you say. Genin: D, Chunin: C, Sp. Jonin+Soul Candy: B and Jonin+Soul Candy: A in Reaper Missions

item.title: Reaper Mission Question
item.content:encoded:
I just looped to season 2 recently, and was starting to redo everything.
After I got soul candy as a chunin, I thought I'd try to go for MC Stripeypants, doing Ninjutsu only.

Through about ~15-20 straight ninjutsu reaper missions, I'm not getting the quest.
I also start to notice that the only quests I am getting are the ones without the soul candy, C and D level reaper missions. Later once I become Special Jonin, I finally was getting B levels missions and got him.

So I wanted to confirm with others, are the reaper missions you can get based on your rank as well?
So Genins can only do D level missions, Chunins can only do D-C, Special Jonin D-B, and so on.
Makes some sense really.
